mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cm_type AS "cmType", a.cm_author AS "cmAuthor", a.cm_name AS "cmName", a.cm_pub_year AS "cmPubYear", a.cm_publisher AS "cmPublisher", a.course_id AS "courseId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_material( id, cm_type, cm_author, cm_name, cm_pub_year, cm_publisher, course_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cmType}, #{cmAuthor}, #{cmName}, #{cmPubYear}, #{cmPublisher}, #{courseId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE course_material SET cm_type = #{cmType}, cm_author = #{cmAuthor}, cm_name = #{cmName}, cm_pub_year = #{cmPubYear}, cm_publisher = #{cmPublisher}, course_id = #{courseId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
